name: Cohiba (Non Cuban) - Silencio - Toro
additionalNotes: The Cohiba Silencio is a medium-bodied smoke that is handmade in Nicaragua. The Silencio sports a smooth, oily Nicaraguan wrapper that drapes a Cameroon binder and fillers from the Dominican Republic and Nicaragua. This awesome blend delivers notes of cedar, pepper, and caramel. The Cohiba Silencio has an excellent draw and burn line.
